transcript.text:
￼














Template & Studio


Managing Images
Pattern

2 min
overview & purpose this tab allows the admin to add new pattern images to be used as a background in the designer studio add a new pattern image you can see the listing of all the pattern images uploaded in the system for the designer studio from the admin >> designer studio >> images >> pattern tab to add a pattern image, click on the ‘+ add ’ button at the top right corner select the pattern category for the image and upload multiple images under that category at once in the designer studio, customers will get the option to set repeat patterns in the background they’ll also get the facility to adjust the pattern, padding, and opacity of the background
Did this page help you?
